name: RESCREW
description: Commander, your ship collided with an asteroid. You managed to seal off the damaged area and get your ship back up and running. But unfortunately your shields were restored a little bit too late. The ship's bio sensors revealed that alien parasites have entered the ship during the leak and infected 3 of your crew members ...and now these infected crew members are secretly conspiring to kill the rest of your crew! Everytime your crew goes to sleep one of them will be dead!
